PREAMBLE: Welcome to a brad new iRacing track, and a piece of motorsport legend, Circuit 24 Heures du Mans. This track is HUGE, and the long straights with the strong draft will make for very close racing. Watch out for fighting for position in corners where you'll lose exit speed onto a long straight, because you'll suddenly be swapmed by everyone behind you!
TRACK_NOTES: None yet - anyone want to do a write-up?
